title: Here Are Your 2019 Emmy Award Winners
text:
Photo: FREDERIC J. BROWN/AFP/Getty Images

The 2019 Emmys are here, which means only one thing: Hot Girl Summer is over, and Hot Girl Awards Season is well underway. The Television Academy has planned a broadcast that’s the host-less with the, uh, most-less … leaving plenty of time to present 27 categories. In case you missed them, last week’s Creative Arts Emmy recipients ranged from Lawful Good (Norman Lear! Rachel Bloom!) to Chaotic Evil (Rent “Live” won a Production Design Emmy over Beyoncé’s Homecoming for, what? Scaffolding?) Tonight’s nominees include a strong HBO showing due to the final seasons of Veep and Game of Thrones, and a general love of Bill Hader. It also features an Outstanding Comedy Actress group that may be the strongest lineup of nominees for anything in any awards show in recent memory. All of the winners are listed below, so you can see if your favorite television show of 2019 won. Providing it aired before June. Or sometime in the back half of 2018. Or wasn’t The Other Two.

Winners

Outstanding Supporting Actor in a Comedy Series

Henry Winkler (Barry)

Anthony Carrigan (Barry)

Stephen Root (Barry)

Tony Hale (Veep)

Tony Shalhoub (The Marvelous Mrs. Maisel)

Alan Arkin (The Kominsky Method)

description: Here is your complete list of the 2019 Emmy Award winners in comedy series, drama series, and more.
